content: loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet flo - front loop only slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 16 gauge 16 sts x 8 row unblocked= 4x4 in granny stitch - not critical for this pattern not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 17 sizes one size - adjustable
